com.edugility.jpa.converters

Class LocaleToLanguageTagConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edugility.jpa.converters.LocaleToLanguageTagConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeConverter<Locale,String>

    public class LocaleToLanguageTagConverter
extends Object
implements AttributeConverter<Locale,String>
    An AttributeConverter that converts a Locale to and from its language tag representation.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    AttributeConverter, Locale

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocaleToLanguageTagConverter()
      Creates a new LocaleToLanguageTagConverter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String convertToDatabaseColumn(Locale locale)
      Calls the Locale.toLanguageTag() method on the supplied Locale and returns its result.
      Locale convertToEntityAttribute(String languageTag)
      Passes the supplied languageTag to the Locale.forLanguageTag(String) method and returns its result.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocaleToLanguageTagConverter

        public LocaleToLanguageTagConverter()
        Creates a new LocaleToLanguageTagConverter.

    • Method Detail

      • convertToDatabaseColumn

        public String convertToDatabaseColumn(Locale locale)
        Calls the Locale.toLanguageTag() method on the supplied Locale and returns its result.

        This method may return null.

        Specified by:
        convertToDatabaseColumn in interface AttributeConverter<Locale,String>
        Parameters:
        locale - the Locale to convert; if null, then null will be returned
        Returns:
        the language tag representation of the supplied Locale, or null
        See Also:
        Locale.toLanguageTag()

      • convertToEntityAttribute

        public Locale convertToEntityAttribute(String languageTag)
        Passes the supplied languageTag to the Locale.forLanguageTag(String) method and returns its result.

        This method may return null.

        Specified by:
        convertToEntityAttribute in interface AttributeConverter<Locale,String>
        Parameters:
        languageTag - a BCP 47-compliant language tag suitable for passing to the Locale.forLanguageTag(String) method; may be null in which case null will be returned
        Returns:
        a Locale corresponding to the supplied languageTag, or null
